reviews.review: How do I get a refund? Not kidding. clicking ready over and over lost my intrest with the game. Was the game fun? Sure at first, but after the issue with clicking ready over and over and over got old very fast. The game is ment to play with friends or others. Not on your own, there for the most fun is in groups. And with the issue being match making well the game its self as a whole is not worth the money. If they change it to free I might come back, but right now the issues are so bad you will lose the want to play fast.
ก็ชอบเเต่มันเล่นไม่ได้เป็นไรไม่รู้
Game looked fun to play but as I create a lobby the game freezes and does not respond everytime someone joins. I have to reboot everytime.
The game crashes every and any time I press the left click.

É uma decisão bem dificil dar avaliação para este jogo, pela questão de ainda não estar totalmente pronto, por exemplo:
-Não puder jogar com seus amigos numa fila random
-Muitos Bugs
-Não puder jogar com amigos a não ser num lobby fechado
O jogo em si é muito bom, tem aquele terror, pânico e tudo, mas como todos os jogo o mesmo tem sua fase em desenvolvimento, e este jogo ainda não esta totalmente pronto, porém eu recomendo este jogo.

GGGGRRRRRAAAATTTEEEE
miserable game. miserable people. you need to spend ludicrous amounts of money just to unlock baseline content and even more time to get the rest.

This game is definately worth the purchase, especially for horror movie fans. It's thrilling, team work based, has a great leveling system and a decent ranking system. The game is mainly reliant on audio queues, which adds to the immersion, and makes it feel more real. Not being able to communicate with other survivors adds a cool twist to working together as a team. Hunting down defenseless survivors is a blast. Survivors have to use natural camouflage, stealth, and thought out tactics in order to outsmart and out manuever the killer.

I only have a few problems, including: Every once and a while it takes a little too long to find a match, and survivers are able to constantly jump through windows over and over, making it impossible to kill them.(This is easily avoided by just ignoring them and focusing on other survivors, but it's still annoying.)

Edit: Infinite window jumping has been fixed :)
Very sad for my pc. Good bye, i will refund it.

Зачем выпускать мультиплеерную игру, в которой не сделали нормально (читай: работающего) соединения между игроками?

Лагает, блять, в каждой 3 игре. В каждой 5 кто-то вылетает. Скорее всего просто верну игру до того, как будет 14 часов, потому что это полная жесть.


Сама игра хорошо, но убегать от маньяка, когда каждые 3 секунды тебя дропает на несколько метров в другую сторону... это так себе

Update 2018
Seems like the game is on the right track. 

----------------------------------------------------
[h1] Treat this game like Early Access[/h1]

This game is a lot of fun just treat it as a non finished product.

This is a very buggy game. There are a lot of exploits that the developers are fixing. There are cheaters that are getting banned.

[h1]Update[/h1]

Now people use macro for killers to get free levels. This is unbelievably bad. I gave them a month and it seems they want to just let this game go.
能不能优化一下? 玩屠夫帧数实在太低了

Its a great game but the game is full of bugs. Playing by your own is fine you can still enjoy the game but if youre trying to play as a survivor with your friends, you gonna have a hard time to find one game..  and clicking ready every 7 seconds will annoy the **** out of you.. as of now we're trying to find a game for like 10 mins ady.

Update.

Game is in really great shape now! Lots of new stuff and they're still adding more stuff. Devs are still active!  Updating and Fixing the game! They never left even after how many years.

It's alright.. I've focused on playing as a killer and I got bored too quickly. I did not find the balance between killer and survivors abilities. I assume in the future, there won't be many killers in the game because someone like me. I hope they can improve killers' skills.
Best lobby simulator

This game has way too many bugs for how much it costs. It's too unfinished to be a full game yet and should have stayed in beta for a longer time before being released. If you are permanately stuck on the ground, then you'll DC after trying to escape from a hook. If that doesn't happen then you'll get hit around the corner because the killer is the host and has shitty connection which plays in their favor. The devs are idiots and will probably never fix these issues and I regret buying this game and wasting my money on it.

生存者4人と殺人鬼1人による非対称の対戦ゲームです。ルールとして生存者側は発電機を5つ修理したあとゲートやハッチを開けて脱出できれば生存者の勝ち。殺人鬼は生存者を手持ちの武器で2回殴った後フックまで運んで吊るし徐々に減少していくHPが0になれば殺人鬼の勝ち。簡単にいえば昔の遊びでいうドロケイ(ケイドロ?)のようなルールです。

[良い点]
・個性的な殺人鬼キャラクター
チェーンソー使いやベアトラップ使いなどプレイ感覚の違うキャラクターが現在3体。今後も各国の伝承などをモチーフとしたものを追加予定とか(日本のもあるかも)

・殺人鬼側は攻撃されることがない
ゲームだと初心者は一方的に攻撃されて終わりってこともありますが殺人鬼側は一方的な生存者への攻撃のみなので買ったばかりの方は殺人鬼側からやることをオススメ。もちろん生存者をうまく見つけたり追跡できるかは保証できませんが。基本は発電機の音や修理失敗時のインジケータを頼りに探し、見つけたら生存者のダッシュの足跡や怪我した後は血痕や苦痛による声が頼りになります。

・ある程度ランダム生成なMAP
大まかには3種ですが建物や防御用の板、発電機、アイテムBOXなどランダムです。

・状況により色々な決断を迫られる生存者のプレイ
生存者側は味方がフックに吊るされると助けるか無視して発電機を直すことを優先するか考えることになります。助けに行けば殺人鬼が待ち構えている場合もありますが無視すれば頭数が減り、修理やフックからの救出に不利になるので臨機応変な対応が必要になります。

・生存者側は死んだ場合の次のゲームまでの回転率が速い
他のゲームでは死んだ場合観戦モードに移行するかレベルアップのポイントを捨てて出ていくかしかありませんがこのゲームはポイントをもらったら出て行って次のゲームに参加することもできます。もちろん残された生存者の運命を見るのもまた楽しいですが。

・それっぽい動きが要求されるルール、ポイント制
生存者/殺人者の行動をそれぞれ4種類に分けられていて稼げるポイントに制限がかかっています。なのでただ安全に発電機を修理して脱出したり殺すだけでは多くのポイントを稼ぐことはできないのです。1ゲームで発電機を直すことに加え味方を救出、治療したり殺人鬼から追われて逃げ切ったりリスクを伴う行動をすることにより多くのポイントをもらえることになります。

・必要最低限な生存者側のコミュニケーション制限
ボイスチャットやテキストチャット、エモーションがなくスタート地点も基本はバラバラでお互いの位置が表示されないので運よく味方に会うまではドキドキです。味方が捕まった場合等は捕まった人だけ(捕まった人側からのみ他の人の位置はわかる)位置が表示されるので救出にいくか迷うことになります(行ったはいいが味方の支援が受けられるとは限らないのです)

・生存者側に対抗手段があまりない所
殺人鬼が近くにいて隠れていたが見つかってしまった場合、逃げることになりますが生存者は他のゲームのように剣や棒で攻撃することはできないのです。逃げて妨害用のパレットを倒して当てることでポイント得ると同時に相手の視界を一時的に妨害できるのでその間にまた隠れたり、窓枠を素早く通り抜けて逃走することで生き残ります。

[悪い点]
・まだまだバランス面や機能面に難あり
発売されたばかりだけあってまだまだな点は多くあるがどんどん調整や修正を行っている段階

・アイテムのフラッシュライトが全く役に立たない
アイテム"フラッシュライト"は生存者の数少ない対抗手段である。殺人鬼の顔に当てると一時的に視界の妨害と運んでいた生存者を落とす効果が期待できる・・・はずですがまず効きません。当てるのが難しく視線を逸らしていれば効果が出ないので接近されて殴られる始末。100時間程度のプレイで1度だけですね成功したのは。

・高いポイントを得るには"なりきり"が要求される
現実的な殺人鬼というよりも映画に出てくるような殺人鬼を演じることで多くポイントを稼げるシステムになっているように感じます。大まかには発見→追跡→殴り倒す→吊るす→違う人を探す→吊るした奴が救出される→別の人を吊るすか逃げた人を吊るすといった感じで長引いたほうがポイントが多くなるシステムになっているのです。競技ではなくゲームとして楽しめる人向きかもしれません。

・最終的にキャラクターの個性が薄くなる
このゲームもスキルのようなシステムが導入されていて各キャラクターに固有スキルが3種あります。がLv30以降固有スキルを他のキャラクターのスキルツリーのようなものに登場させることができるシステムを採用しているので最終的には一緒な感じに。上位の完全固有なスキルがあるといいと思う。

　割と新しめのゲームで安めなのまだまだ発展途上ですが追いかけっこや逃げながら隠れる時のドキドキ感、撒いた時のしてやったり感生存者を捕まえた時のしてやったり感は現時点でも十分楽しめます。
　映画のテキサスチェーンソーやワナオトコ、インビジブル等スプラッター系の映画が好きな人は登場人物になりきって遊べるので楽しめるかと思います。

Part 4:  Another post update review.  I'd once again like to commend the developers for being total twats.  Instead of working on matchingmaking services like any sane game designer would do, they decided it was more important to release another killer and provide useless scaling patches in order to undo the damages that they did with the previous ones.  Only in Dead by Dogshit would a person decide that having your users play a ready up simulator for 45 minutes prior to getting a game with friends is a praise worthy event.  

Part 3:  Re-updating my review again.  I'd like to add that after multiple updates the match making system is worse than ever.  Not only is it nearly impossible to get into a match, but when you do, you get put against the fags who have been playing this game since its conception.  If sitting around for 30 minutes without a game trying to queue with your friends prior to getting skull fucked is for you, buy this game.

Part 2: Improving my review from dogshit to mediocre.  The group matchmaking now actually works, in the sense that if you wish to be placed against people that consistantly butt fuck you without any type of lube.  Thanks for placing a new player against chodes that have been playing the beta for more cumulative time than they've seen any woman except for their mother.

At release game was fun. The more they added "content" the easier it got for killer, game became a point grinding system rather than a survival game. 

Everything is killer oriented, only groups of 3 or 4 have a fair chance against DLC killers. So the game is pretty PTW. 

Face huggers after years still have no counterplay. 
Game used to be about jukes, now it's about grinding perks and killer perks will make any gameplay options irrelevant.

Find another game, this one got old and aged very very badly.

The bugs are real but the idea is nice, i hope the devs keep on working hard

Im Allgemeinen ist es eine wunderbare Spielidee und wie ich finde,sehr gut umgesetzt! Doch obwohl dieses Game trotz des Horrors viel Freude und Spaß bereitet,hat es einige "Macken",wodurch es teilweise den Spielspaß raubt. Denn momentan kann man kaum etwas an den Grafikeinstellungen vornehmen,da es so etwas wie "Texturendetails" und andere Sachen nicht gibt. Dadurch haben Menschen mit einer schlechteren Grafikkarte mit den FPS zu kämpfen. Außerdem wurde letztens die Funktion,mit Freunden zusammen spielen zu können hinzugefügt. An sich ist das eine super Sache,jedoch ist es sehr schwer mit Freunden einer Lobby bzw. einem Killer beizutreten,obwohl es,wenn man alleine versucht beizutreten,einwandfrei funktioniert. Wenn diese 2 Kritikpunkte verbessert werden würden,hätte man wirklich nichts mehr am Spiel auszusetzen. :)

Waited over a month for the play with friends to be released, finally came out and you now have to hit the ready button for 15 minutes before you get into a game.

Worst matchmaking from a game I've seen.

I used to love dbd, got thousands of hours clocked up across all platform. I do love a challenging game hence why i've played dbd since early access on PC then supported it on other platforms.

I took a break from playing it but recently came back to find the game is now completely unbalanced in the killers favour and the amount of people (survivors included) that blatantly hack their perks is unbelievable.

The whole experience seems to have changed including the community, team work seems to have vanished for the majority. I couldn't believe it when i was downed only to be tea bagged by my team mates (funny but i was still shocked) then they ran away and out the exit leaving me.

the survivor players have also gotten salty to other survivors calling people a b##ch or dead weight amongst other things you can imagine for leaving them when 5/10 times they would be the best player on the team, Killers on the other hand seem to have become friendly (even if it is unbalanced) and give you a gg at the end match.

if this is how the devs want this game to go then i'm no longer gonna be a part of it, i can soon see this going  to flop i know a few people that have walked away with no plans to return
O jogo em si é muito bom , bem leve com uma criatividade imensa com a jogabilidade do coração bater quanto o monstro aproximar-se ... Jogar com os amigos é muito mais divertido !

Игра стала намного лучше, чем было год или два назад. Изменили очень многое, от чего в эту игру стало интересно играть.
К сожалению игра имеет ряд недостатков, таких как какая нибудь десинхронизация, боты на более лучших рангов, токсичные игроки на более высоких рангах или очень сильные маньяки в виде доктора, которые с парой модификаций на свою способность могут за километры вычислять выживших. DLC покупать вообще не рекомендую, без них в принципе можно жить.

I'm a pretty short winded guy so, here's it quick
It's really fun for both sides, if you haven't played a Mario party to know what it means by asymmetric then, it's a 1v4 with the one being unkillable.  It can make you feel all powerful, and it can make you feel like your really in the woods with a killer, but if the skill gap is too large then either side can find themselves frustrated as with all multiplayers.  The game is glitchy right now, 1 out of 5 matches it seems you'll run into a glitch that's gonna annoy you, the unhealable crawl being one on the most game breaking.  If you can get past this it's got, well, not much, the one game mode in a ranked online play, and the other game mode against friends, no mix of those two can be achieved.  This is actually enough however in my eyes, it does well in atmosphere for both sides and is a pleasant experience all around, as you level your gonna find more and more strategy coming into play and more risk reward (for survivors mostly) 
It's worth what it costs expecially if your have friends who play it too.

this game is a little buggy but that doesnt take away from how fun it is! the game is pretty simple either kill the survivors or run away from the killer. both are playable and are extremely fun to play. i recomend this game to anybody with a pc

It's a kinda fun game but a really frustrating one.
Apparently I can't turn off Mouse Smoothing and the game looks laggy even though it runs at 60+ FPS.
Killers have always had it easier than survivors to get points and overall the community is the biggest problem of this game. The constant whining from both survivors and killers make it really hard for devs to make decisions without making people salty.

Habe das Spiel sehr lange gespielt um sagen zu können, dass es schon sehr viel Spaß machen kann, sogar als Survivor. Die Community ist zwar oft sehr salzig und die Killer nicht immer nett, aber damit muss man klarkommen.
Killer: Eignet sich gut um alleine zu spielen halt und Übung macht einfach den Meister. Es wird immer mal nervige Survivor geben, aber dennoch macht es am meisten Spaß wenn man einfach fair spielt.
Survivor: Spiele ich lieber in einer Gruppe bzw. mindestens zu zweit, da man sich auf randoms leider zu selten verlassen kann. Mit anderen Freunden zsm macht es schon Spaß und wenn der Killer fair spielt ist es auch halb so schlimm wenn man mal nicht überlebt ;p
wow
really cool and fun game but the waiting time on a game is sometimes really long.

Dead by Daylight?

DbD* est sympa, pour les trouillards qui hésitent à se l'acheter.... Bah sa fait pas peur. Non, tu auras la même sensation d'exitation comme quand tu jouais au chat et la souris dans la cours de récré en CM1, c'est juste l'ambiance du jeu qui est comme ça, et ma foi c'est pas déplaisant.

En gros c'est uniquement du multi, une partie à 5 joueurs (4 survivants et 1 tueur). Pour l'instant, il n'y a qu'un vague scénario pour ceux qui se pose la question.

Les survivants ont pour but de s'échaper, en allument 5 générateurs et en suite ouvrir une porte, tout en évitant de se faire slasher par le tueur/Morsay...... Oups cette blague marche pas puisqu'il n'y a pas que des slasheurs dans le jeu :/
Bon bref
Il faut également savoir que s'il ne reste plus qu'un survivant en vie, une trappe s'ouvre, laissant une chance au dernier de s'échaper.
Les survivants peuvent aussi utiliser des objets obtenus en utilisant des points ou alors in game dans des boîtes.

Le but du tueur c'est de... J'ai vraiment besoin de te dire ce qu'il doit faire?
Il doit acrocher ses 4 victimes sur des crochets afin de les sacrifier. Mais les autres peuvent venir le sauver, alors attention.
Il doit mettre 2 coups à la victime pour qu'elle tombe à terre et donc il pourra la prendre pour l'acrocher. Mais la victime peut s'enfuire en gesticulant.

Chaque tueur à sa propre manière de traquer et tuer ses proies. Les survivants disposent de plusieurs objets pour se faciliter la tâche, et les 2 rôles (survivants et tueur) possèdent leurs propres compétences, et l'abre des compétances est générer aléatoirement.

-Les +:
_Le jeu est beau
_Le gameplay est bien
_La bande-son aussi
_Le système des compétences est bien
_Plus drôles avec des amis

-Les -:
_Spectre=cancer
_Pas si effrayant que ça
_Il faut souvent attendre des siècles pour jouer une partie (donc jouer avec vos amis en partie priver)
_Des bugs (survivant qui s'évade tout seul de la map dès le commencement de la game, tueur qui s'envole dans le ciel parfois,...)

Le jeu est bien (même si c'est ma soeur qui y joue le plus mdr) mais possède son lot de défauts. Jouer avec des amis, c'est plus drôle (moi je peut pas parce que mes amis sont trop *** pour s'acheter des bons jeux).

Cette review fut écrite en écoutant des musiques japonaises.

*Dead by Daylight
The game is super grindy but i still love it. i hope they do something to help this grind but doubt it.

The optimization was shit, is shit and will continue to be shit. Devs are too busy trying to license popular characters and adding new skins to the game. Game is extremely survivor sided and the killers get punished with the smallest mistake they make. When the devs give a killer the slightest hint of power, they nerf the killer to the ground, then give them a minuscule amount of buff a couple of months later. This is coming from a killer main who has achieved rank 1 many times and has played the game on and off since launch. The challenge is, of course, great but it still doesn't feel right. It's unnatural. You don't feel like a killer in this game. If you don't put in everything you've got into a match, the survivors can easily win just by holding down left click. And they're never going to change this dynamic. Survivors need to have fun together and the killer has to actually play competitively. Killers need to entertain streaming survivor groups. That's what the game turned out to be. They're making money out of it so they have no reason to change their way. Unfortunate.
yfq
10 из 10 взорванных генераторов

Guten Morgen/Mittag/Abend is mir eig. egal. Ich wollte mich mal zu Dbd äußern. Wie das Spiel rauskam hätte ich es niemanden empfohlen. Es war einfach nur verbuggt, man konnte nicht mit Freunden spielen und der Killer war einfach nur OP. Mittlerweile hat es sich sehr verbessert. Man kann mit Freunden spielen es hat sich auch vom Design verbessert. Man konnte auch vor kurzem nicht mal die Mausempfindlichkeit einstellenO_O, aber mitlerweile gehts. Ich kann euch leser auf jedem fall dieses Spiel empfehlen. Vielleicht sieht man sich ja auch mal;-). Habt Spaß seit artig Camped als Killer nicht und sterbt nicht so früh.

Schönen Tag noch!

Ohne viele Worte ein sehr gutes Spiel!!! Wenn man aber als Killer spielt uhhhhhh BOMBE! Erst 3 Karten 3 Killers und das reicht erst mal für 20€. Ich würde das Spiel aufjedenfall weiter empfehlen. Ну что сказать игра в целом хороша,динамичная и нервишки порой щекотит)))Особенно когда остаешься один и осталось еще завести последний генератор и свалит!Но система конекта в лобби ,просто пипец!!!Постоянные вылеты , вечная ошибка конекта к лобби ....приходися постоянно тыкать конект...конект...конект, а вответ борода!А самое интересное когда перестараешься с этим делом, так вообще полный треш с игрой ....залипнет,только ребут игры или текстуры такое выдают....было как-то что мы типа все стоим а на переднем плане манъяк наш лыбится)))) Так что пока не пофиксят проблему конекта с лобби , мой палец вниз!!!

Seriously... I don't understand why everybody is into this game. The Killer feels way to strong and as survivor you are nothing but meat... Every action takes so long that it is very easy for the Killer to get everybody. I played like 5 rounds and got killed with maximum 2 Generator acitvated. Nah. Is it perfect? No. Is it fun? Bloody hell yes. 

This game isn't going to be for everyone. Odds are you ARE going to be helpless as a suvivor. That's the point. Survivors are suppose to be helpless against a Killer. As a suvivor you don't play to win games, you play to survive them. And as a Killer you play to do one thing and only one thing, kill. If you don't like being helpless against an unstopable Killer IF he finds you, then odds are you aren't going to like Dead by Daylight. But if you are smart. Then either the Survivors or Killer can turn the odds in their favor to make fools out of the other.

Pros-
-Playing as a slasher flick killer. 3 of them with more in the works.
-Being a victim of a slasher flick. Escape death with skill, maybe just dumb luck, or die in soiled pants.
-4v1 gameplay that goes extra lengths to make each side stand apart from the other.
-Great use of sounds for information.
-RNG tile based maps. 1-2 landmarks per map will aways be in the same places, but everything else will change every game.
-Games last 10 minutes on average.

Cons-
-Some model bugs like rarely seeing your own hair/eyes as a Killer or some janky movement with Killers interacting with suvivors.
-Balance. One Killer is weaker than the other 2. Windows close together can make near 100% safe zones for survivors depending on a few things. Some perks are rather annoying, maybe a touch OP.
-Games have no timers. If someone wants to waste your time, they can if they are good enough.
-No communication. It is impossible to talk to each other without 3rd party chats like Steam, Teamspeak, Skype, ect.
-Making a lobby as a Killer can take up to 10 minutes to fill. Not from player counts mind you. Either another bug or a waiting list with strict "first come, first filled" rules.

In short-

For $20 you are going to get one hell of a fun game! Just note that it might not be for everyone as not everyone can handle playing as victims who are by design made to be helpless more often than not.

Detailliertes Review: Dead by Daylight ist ein Spiel, dass sich am besten mit einem "Fang-  & Versteckspiel" für Erwachsene vergleichen lässt. Der Fänger ist der "Killer", der jeweils unterschiedliche Spezialfähigkeiten hat. Einer legt Bärenfallen, der "Hillbilly" nutzt seine Sprintfähigkeiten mit der Kettensäge, der Discopumper "Geist" (der nur seinen Oberkörper trainiert,) macht sich unsichtbar, und die Kranke-Schwester springt direkt mit ihrer rostigen Knochensäge durch Wände. Der Fänger hat die Aufgabe vier "Opfer" in seiner Arena (Schrottplatz, Schlachthaus, Irrenanstalt, Kornfeld) zu fangen und an individuell gestalteten Fleischerhaken aufzuhängen.

Die Opfer bestehen aus einem multinationalen, perfekt gegenderten Team aus den üblichen Stereotypen eines B-Horror Movies. Alle vier (manchmal weniger durch Disconnects) müssen Generatoren aktivieren, die jeweils die Ausgangstore der Arena öffnen und die "Opfer" in die Freiheit entlassen. Jeder Charakter hat gewissen Stärken, die mit Perks erweitert und verstärkt werden können. Aber ob Perk oder nicht, wenn der "Killer" in der Nähe ist, dann bringt dir meistens nur eins: nicht in Panik geraten!

Anfänglich hatte das Spiel unglaubliche Bugs! Ich hatte es fast bereut gekauft zu haben. An die Entwickler kann jetzt aber ein großes Lob ausgesprochen werden! Das Spiel ist meines erachtens gut ausbalanciert und es macht sowohl Spaß als Killer, als auch als Opfer in der Arena zu starten. Wer detailliertere Eindrücke des Gameplays möchte, dem seien die Let's Plays von Gronkh, Curry, Pandorya und Tobinator ans Herz gelegt.

Перед пользователями встаёт вопрос... покупать игру или нет? Надеюсь мой обзор поможет вам на него ответить, начнём. С горем пополам я наиграл в игру 500+ часов, какие же есть плюсы? Динамика, необычная задумка, можно играть с друзьями и цена... и всё. Минусы - однообразие (игра быстро приедается из-за своего однообразия), огромное количество багов (да выходят фиксы, но в месте с ними выходят и новые баги, так что это мёртвый круг) некий "пофигизм" от разрабов, ибо они сами не играют в игру, а говорят что всё нормально, багоюзеры (да это отсылка к ещё одному минусу, но в игре огромное количесто багоюзеров, даже сейчас можно найти людей, которые багают осколки). И ещё один минус, который взбесил меня - Наиграл в игру, на следующий день захожу, уровен, ранг и так далее.. всё сброшено, кто-то скажет что это сброс, но нет, на сбросе снимают только ранги. Так вот... подведём итоги - Цена игры нормальная, но брать её только на свой страх и риск. Я отыграл 500 часов и сожалею о покупе... Даже если вы играете в неё, она вам нравится... Поймите, когда вы возьмёте первые ранги, вы поймёте, что только делать тут больше нечего. Изначально отзыв был положительным, но игра умерла... На этом всё, спасибо за внимение <3

Great game, just can't recommend it due to being terribly made.. Teh dev should be ashamed at some of the choices they've made.

Literally just download something or lag out your internet, chose killer and free win.. The survivors will literally jog around and not know be able to tell their own position.. Until they add a limit to ping and hosting.. Ranks should be taken out completely.

Other then that and few sounds issues, the gameplay is actually really fun when you get the hang of it, especially when you play with friends  (match making is a pain in the ass atm, but i'm sure it'll be fix eventually)

Devs should of put this as early access, least then they could use it as an excuse for some of the terrible issues.

Juego rotisimo. Desde que metieron a Michael Mayers esta rotisimo, entre otras cosas hace instant kill y en nivel uno es indetectable. Pero ademas el resto de asesinos igual, las posibilidades de sobrevivir son minimas (retirada de tablas del mapa, reducción de zona de acertado en motores y ganchos... juegues como juegues. Estaba muy enganchado ya que era divertido el juego, pero desde la ultima actualización importante, lo abandone. Como un juego que estaba muy bien ha terminado roto con los asesinos chetadisimos. Podian tener juego para rato, pero cada vez que tocan lo destrozan. Ya no recomiendo este juego y muy mal pagar por un DLC  de temporada (yo no lo compre y menos mal).

我不知道开发商能不能看懂我说的话，但是既然你们卖了这个游戏就有义务维护游戏的公平和谐，游戏环境简直一团糟，各种外挂和bug充斥，游戏里面充斥着各种所谓的迅雷屠夫、透视屠夫、减速屠夫、隐身杀人屠夫，严重影响了玩家的游戏体验，如果开发商你们只是想做一锤子买卖，就当我什么都没说！

This game is Racist against bad pc's, When I first got DBD I was so excited to play but when I got on, the fps beat the crap out of me and said I'll see you next time. So after, I was brutally beaten, I came with a plan and set the shadow, texture, effects and anti-aliasing quality to zero and went on DBD. Then the cinematic played and it showed no signs of freezing. I thought HA, no fps is gonna bully me around. As soon as I walk pass the cinematic door and about to press the spacebar button, the fps was hiding by the door and locked it. This time, I was beaten to submission. I cried everyday, until I find a good pc that's affordable for a 16 year old with no job.  (T_T -)

หลักๆดีครับ แต่คนมีโรค โดยเฉพาะโลกหัวใจอย่าเล่น ผมไม่ได้เป็นยังจะหัวใจวายตายละ ถึงจะเล่นนานๆก็ทำให้ตื่นเต้นได้ทุกรอบ
มีระบบอัพสกิล มีชุดให้เปลี่ยนนิดหน่อย(อนาคตมีอีกแน่ๆ) มีมีผู้รอดชีวิตให้เล่น 4 คน(ปัจจุบัน) แต่ละตัวมีประวัติของตัวเอง(ไปหาอ่านกันได้คนไทยแปลไว้อยู่) และแต่ละตัวสกิลจะต่างกัน มีถึก วิ่งไวแล้วก็อะไรต่างๆ หลังจากอัพสกิลจะได้ไอเทมไว้ใช้ในเกม ถ้าใช้ไปแล้วไอเทมจะหายต้องมาซื้อใหม่ ฆาตกร มี4ตัวเช่นกัน เห็นว่าตัวใหม่ใกล้มาแล้ว ฆาตกรก็เหมือนกับกับผู้รอดชีวิตครับ สกิลต่างกัน แต่ละตัวรู้สึกว่าจะมี สกิลฆ่าได้ทันทีซึ่งผมก็ไม่เคยลอง เพราะยังเล่นไม่ถึง 
กราฟฟิคสวยงาม เสียงดนตรีเร้าใจ คะแนนผมให้ 8/10 ครับ เพราะอีก2คะแนน จะไปติดตรงที่มีบัค แถมเป็นบ่อยด้วย เกือยจะทุกรอบเลยก็ได้
แต่บอกเลยว่าผมแนะนำ เพราะนี้ก็แค่แพทแรกๆ ดี๋ยวเขาก็ต้องแก้ไขเป็นจุดๆครับ ซื้อมาคุ้มแน่นอน

Ok, aqui vai um comentário de uma pessoa que joga esse jogo desde seu lançamento, comprei ele em julho de 2016 e o jogo lançou em junho de 2016, então sou uma pessoa que acompanhou muito suas mudanças e vi coisas ruins e boas.
Eu lembro da primeira vez que vi esse jogo em um vídeo e ter amado a ideia, sempre gostei desse estilo, fugir de um assassino ou ser o assassino. 
Dead by Daylight é um jogo onde conheci várias pessoas pessoas que hoje são grandes amigos meus, mas isso não é sempre, aproveite quando você achar alguém legal, pois nem sempre isso acontecerá pois o jogo tem uma das comunidades mais tóxicas que já vi, eu sou uma pessoa que está sempre acompanhando a comunidade do jogo, então conheço vários youtubers e streamers de DBD, muitos são bons, outros, são tão tóxicos que dá vontade de tossirvendo seus vídeos ou lives. Não vou dar exemplo, mas um dos mais famosos foi um dos que mais fez e ainda faz a comunidade ser tão nojenta, já vi comentários de gente parando de jogar por causa da comunidade, ninguém se respeita, todo mundo se xinga e até comete bullying.
Outro grande problema é a própria empresa do jogo, a Behaviour, ela tem muitos problemas de balanceamento para seu jogo, e ainda temos muitos bugs, MUITOS bugs, outros divertidos e engraçados, outros que irritam, que te obrigam a reiniciar o jogo, mas eu consigo ver a Behaviour lutando para melhorar seu jogo, pelo menos, tentando, eu não culpo elas, é muito difícil trabalhar num jogo assim, principalmente, com uma comunidade assim.
Ignorando esses problemas, o jogo é MUITO divertido, você ainda pode sair com players tóxicos que vão te deixar pra baixo ou irritado, mas, ignore-as e vá para a outra, ainda será divertido, DBD é um jogo que eu amo do fundo do meu coração, um dos meus jogos favoritos de todos os tempos, e atualmente, meu jogo favorito, é um jogo viciante, divertido principalmente com amigos, muito recomendado, compre, pois esse jogo pode ser para você igual foi pra mim, rendeu amizades e muitas horas de diversão e risadas.
Nota: 10/10
Sim! Na minha antiga análise a nota estava 9.5/10 mas eu mudei, pelo simples fato que sim, esse jogo tem problemas, tem gente idiota que realmente irrita e enche o saco, mas, nada atrapalha meu amor por esse jogo, então sim, 10/10 <3

The game sucks. The killer can abuse a lot of things: leaving the lobby , leaving the game early so the players lose points. It takes too much to find a game and you have to press "Ready" again every time a match was not good to join in order to look further for a game. This kind of things make a very bad gaming experience. I also don't understand how this game is so good rated. I wish i could refund the game and take my money back. They are a lot of better games with even lower price out there.
